func.title: GetPathLength

param.name: startx
param.desc: X coordinate of starting position. Always global coordinate.

param.name: starty
param.desc: Y coordinate of starting position. Always global coordinate.

param.name: endx
param.desc: X coordinate of end position. Always global coordinate.

param.name: endy
param.desc: Y coordinate of end position. Always global coordinate.

param.name: depth
param.desc: Determines search depth of the pathfinder algorithm (range from 1 - 10 with default 1). Warning: higher values may slow down the game. See also the PathFinder entry in the DefCore.

func.desc: Searches for a path from start point to end point using the pathfinding algorithm as used by clonks and returns the length of the found path. Returns nil if no path was found.

example.code: var dist = GetPathLength(GetX(), GetY(), GetX(FindBase(GetOwner())), GetY(FindBase(GetOwner())));
example.text: Determines the distance from an object to its closest friendly base.
